Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SPACE VOYAGES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Space is no longer just for governments. Little companies with big ideas are now reaching for the skies, making commercial human spaceflight a reality. Private businesses are investing big and aiming high, building their own rockets and orbiters, deploying commercial satellites to connect the globe, and preparing for space tourism. NASA's shuttle may have been grounded, but for corporations, the sky is no longer the limit.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Emmanuelle embarks upon the mythic railroad line which runs across the valleys of Brahmaputra and the Ganges.

Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: THE LAST TIGHTROPE DANCER OF ARMENIA
Clip.Episode: The Last Tightrope Dancer of Armenia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The two most celebrated tightrope dancers in Armenia are now in their 80s. Now they share the same hope -- that the only remaining tightrope student will carry on their life's work. But will 17 year old orphan Hovsep want to accept the responsibility?

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: ASIA'S MONARCHIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey to the heart of these beautiful lands to understand the relationship between the people and their monarchs.

Clip.Title: AMERICA IN SPACE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Explore NASA's development from its founding in 1958 to its preparation for a moon landing in stunning HD.

Clip.Title: PREHISTORIC ASTRONOMERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A controversial investigation presents evidence that cave-dwelling homo-sapiens invented Astronomy.
